description: Creates a real-time log configuration. After you create a real-time log configuration, you can attach it to one or more cache behaviors to send real-time log data to the specified Amazon Kinesis data stream. For more information about real-time log configurations, see Real-time logs in the Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide.

parameters.name: EndPoints
parameters.description: Contains information about the Amazon Kinesis data stream where you are sending real-time log data. (dict) --- Contains information about the Amazon Kinesis data stream where you're sending real-time log data in a real-time log configuration. The type of data stream where you are sending real-time log data. The only valid value is Kinesis. KinesisStreamConfig (dict) --- Contains information about the Amazon Kinesis data stream where you are sending real-time log data in a real-time log configuration. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that CloudFront can use to send real-time log data to your Kinesis data stream. For more information the IAM role, see Real-time log configuration IAM role in the Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis data stream where you are sending real-time log data.

nested_params.name: StreamType
nested_params.description: The type of data stream where you are sending real-time log data. The only valid value is Kinesis.

nested_params.name: KinesisStreamConfig
nested_params.description: Contains information about the Amazon Kinesis data stream where you are sending real-time log data in a real-time log configuration.

nested_params.name: RoleARN
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that CloudFront can use to send real-time log data to your Kinesis data stream. For more information the IAM role, see Real-time log configuration IAM role in the Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide.

nested_params.name: StreamARN
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis data stream where you are sending real-time log data.

parameters.name: Fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to include in each real-time log record. For more information about fields, see Real-time log configuration fields in the Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide. (string) ---

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A unique name to identify this real-time log configuration.

parameters.name: SamplingRate
parameters.description: The sampling rate for this real-time log configuration. You can specify a whole number between 1 and 100 (inclusive) to determine the percentage of viewer requests that are represented in the real-time log data.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this real-time log configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The unique name of this real-time log configuration.

nested_items.name: SamplingRate
nested_items.description: The sampling rate for this real-time log configuration. The sampling rate determines the percentage of viewer requests that are represented in the real-time log data. The sampling rate is an integer between 1 and 100, inclusive.

nested_items.name: EndPoints
nested_items.description: Contains information about the Amazon Kinesis data stream where you are sending real-time log data for this real-time log configuration.

nested_items.name: StreamType
nested_items.description: The type of data stream where you are sending real-time log data. The only valid value is Kinesis.

nested_items.name: KinesisStreamConfig
nested_items.description: Contains information about the Amazon Kinesis data stream where you are sending real-time log data in a real-time log configuration.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that CloudFront can use to send real-time log data to your Kinesis data stream.

nested_items.name: StreamARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis data stream where you are sending real-time log data.

nested_items.name: Fields
nested_items.description: A list of fields that are included in each real-time log record. In an API response, the fields are provided in the same order in which they are sent to the Amazon Kinesis data stream.
